title: How I Made Partner: Be 'A Good Firm Citizen in Addition to a Good Lawyer,' Says Jennifer Mikels of Goulston & Storrs
text: Job title: Director Practice area: Litigation "Answer your phone when it rings, return your messages and emails promptly, and become the person your colleagues can rely on even if that means spending time on non-billable matters such as serving as a sounding board for others."
